Nostalgická hra. Portal jsem hrával už jako malej zmrd na bráchovo pc když byl náhodou dýl ve škole nebo venku. I teď mi nějaký level dělá problém :D nejlíp utracených 0,99€ :DD
The story was very engaging and fun. The mechanics worked really well and never overstayed their welcome. Would 100 percent replay :)
玩了12个小时.一路走来有太多的艰辛.玩到结局发现一切都值得

Uma das raras vezes que escrevo uma review em qualquer jogo que eu termino, mas portal 2 virou meu jogo favorito a partir de hoje, melhor que o portal 1, trazendo uma riqueza maior na historia ja contada anteriormente, com mais variedades de puzzles e cenarios, e a musica dos creditos foi a melhor
wheatley is comedian therefore game is S tier
An absolute masterpiece. From story to gameplay, voice acting to atmosphere.  If you haven't played both portal 1 and 2 yet, why haven't you?

非常好玩，是一代的續作，收回第一代的伏筆，劇情也更廣大！比較起來第一代就只是序章，第二代才是故事真正的開始！感覺的出來製作團隊非常用心在這一款遊戲上！
